data.current_summary: Return the current message by annunciator type
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve current message for annunciator type
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the currently active message for the specified annunciator type. The annunciator parameter should be one of the supported AnnunciatorMessageType values. Returns a MessageViewModel object containing the message content, styling, and display properties. If no active message exists for the annunciator type, an appropriate response will be returned.

message: Operation 'get_/api/Message/message/{annunciator}/{date}' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_input_details, unclear_purpose, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary is awkwardly phrased ('after date time specified'). Description is missing entirely, preventing AI agents from understanding parameter formats, valid annunciator values, response structure, and use cases. Added clarity on date format expectations, parameter validation, response schema, and practical use cases for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Return the most recent message by annunciator after date time specified
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve most recent message after specified date
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the most recent message for the specified annunciator type that was created or activated after the provided date/time. The annunciator parameter should be one of the supported AnnunciatorMessageType values, and the date parameter should be provided in ISO 8601 format. Returns a MessageViewModel object containing the message content, styling, and display properties. Useful for retrieving historical messages or messages within a specific time window.
